## Welcome

This workshop brings together researchers and practitioners from across Africa to build capacity in data science methods for health technology assessment and supply chain modeling.

::: {.callout-note}
## Workshop Dates
**February 2-7, 2026** | Addis Ababa University, Ethiopia
:::

## Workshop Overview

This intensive 4-day workshop covers:

- **Days 1-3**: Data Science Foundations, Machine Learning, and Integration
- **Day 4**: Agent-Based Modeling for Supply Chains
- **Days 5-6**: Health Technology Assessment
